question: How much does it cost to ship from Toronto to Hong Kong? (Q#1)
answer: The cost depends on shipment size, weight, service type, and customs requirements. Use our online calculator or contact us directly.

question: How long does shipping from Toronto to Hong Kong take? (Q#2)
answer: Air freight takes 3–7 days, sea freight 20–35 days, and express courier 2–5 days. Customs may affect delivery time.

question: What items are restricted or prohibited from shipping? (Q#3)
answer: We do not carry hazardous materials, perishables without special arrangements, or illegal goods. See our full restriction list.

question: Do you offer door-to-door service? (Q#4)
answer: Yes, we provide various shipping methods including door-to-door service.

question: Can I track my shipment? (Q#5)
answer: Yes. Each shipment gets a tracking number. Track online anytime.

question: What documents are required for international shipping? (Q#6)
answer: You typically need a commercial invoice, packing list, and bill of lading. We guide you through the process.

question: Do you offer shipping insurance? (Q#7)
answer: Yes. Insurance is available and recommended for high-value goods.

question: How are customs duties and taxes handled? (Q#8)
answer: Duties depend on the destination. We offer both DDU and DDP options.

question: Can I consolidate multiple shipments into one? (Q#9)
answer: Yes. We offer consolidation to reduce costs and optimize space.

question: Do you provide packing and labeling services? (Q#10)
answer: Yes. We offer professional packaging and labeling services.

question: How do I request a shipping quote? (Q#11)
answer: Use our instant quote tool or email/call us with shipment details.

question: What payment methods do you accept? (Q#12)
answer: We accept bank transfer, credit cards, PayPal, and invoicing for approved clients.

question: What if my shipment is delayed or lost? (Q#13)
answer: If issues arise, our claims team will assist. Insurance speeds up resolution.

question: Do you handle customs clearance? (Q#14)
answer: Yes. We offer customs brokerage services at origin and destination.

question: Can I speak with a shipping specialist? (Q#15)
answer: Yes. Our consultants are available Mon–Sat, 9am–6pm.
